resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/76820</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>76820</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40d81c98-da8c-4133-27b1-6c2de7cbc634#1#7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az internacionális gótika festészete és szobrászata</string>
            <string language="en">the painting and sculputre of international gothic art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">der Anstrich und das sculputre der 
internationalen gotischen kunst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la peinture et le sculputre de l'art gothique 
international</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a pintura e o sculputre da arte gothic 
internacional</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la pittura e lo sculputre di arte gotica 
internazionale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η ζωγραφική και sculputre της διεθνούς γοτθικής 
τέχνης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la pintura y el sculputre del arte gótico 
internacional</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az internacionális gótika festészetének és szobrászatának bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">presentation of the painting and sculputre of international gothic art</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">internacionális gótika,  udvari művészet,  lágy stílus,  </string>
            <string language="en">international gothic, court art, soft style</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung des Anstriches und des sculputre der 
internationalen gotischen kunst</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">présentation de la peinture et du sculputre de 
l'art gothique international</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">apresentação da pintura e do sculputre da arte 
gothic internacional</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">presentazione della pittura e dello sculputre di 
arte gotica internazionale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρουσίαση της ζωγραφικής και sculputre της διεθνούς
γοτθικής τέχνης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">presentación de la pintura y del sculputre del 
arte gótico internacional</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">internationales gotisches, Gerichtkunst, weiche Art</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">gothique international, art de cour, modèle doux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gothic internacional, arte da corte, estilo macio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gotico internazionale, arte della corte, stile morbido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διεθνής γοτθικός, τέχνη δικαστηρίων, μαλακό ύφος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gótico internacional, arte de la corte, estilo suave</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">13-15</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:Kossuth Kiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>76820</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=40d81c98-da8c-4133-27b1-6c2de7cbc634&v=1&b=7</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
